term.title: hydrogel

item.text: Gel in which the swelling agent is water.

notes.item: The network component of a hydrogel is usually a polymer network.
A hydrogel in which the network component is a colloidal network may be referred to as an aquagel.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 1801. 'Definitions of terms relating to the structure and processing of sols, gels, networks, and inorganic-organic hybrid materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2007)' on page 1807 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779101801)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
